description.raw:
Changed reference system to which the polar (spherical) coordinates are calculated.
Polar coordinates are now: radius, azimuth, elevation; with elevation as angle from the horizontal plane (with positive values above the horizontal plane) and both angles in degrees.

Changed head yaw joint axis in nao-Type-0 to match rotation direction in SimSpark.

* Created new branch sphere_to_cart_fix

* Use the same polar coordinates as SimSpark in vision perceptor.

    * Changed Geometry::CartToSphere and Geometry::SphereToCart to Geometry::CartToPolar and Geometry::PolarToCart and adapted calculations to match the SimSpark convention. Polar coordinates in SimSpark are of the following format: radius, azimuth, elevation; where elevation is the angle to the horizontal plane (with positive values above the horizontal plane).
    * Adapted Geometry test to new CartToPolar and PolatToCart methods.

* Fixed direction of head yaw joint in nao-type-0.

    * Changed direction of head yaw joint axis from (0, 0, -1) to (0, 0, 1) to match the definition in SimSpark.
description.html:
Changed reference system to which the polar (spherical) coordinates are calculated. Polar coordinates are now: radius, azimuth, elevation; with elevation as angle from the horizontal plane (with positive values above the horizontal plane) and both angles in degrees.

Changed head yaw joint axis in nao-Type-0 to match rotation direction in SimSpark.

  • Created new branch sphere_to_cart_fix

  • Use the same polar coordinates as SimSpark in vision perceptor.

    • Changed Geometry::CartToSphere and Geometry::SphereToCart to Geometry::CartToPolar and Geometry::PolarToCart and adapted calculations to match the SimSpark convention. Polar coordinates in SimSpark are of the following format: radius, azimuth, elevation; where elevation is the angle to the horizontal plane (with positive values above the horizontal plane).
    • Adapted Geometry test to new CartToPolar and PolatToCart methods.

  • Fixed direction of head yaw joint in nao-type-0.

    • Changed direction of head yaw joint axis from (0, 0, -1) to (0, 0, 1) to match the definition in SimSpark.

title.raw: Adjusted vision perception to match SimSpark convention.
title.html: Adjusted vision perception to match SimSpark convention.
